Key Match Events: The Cubs clinched a winning record with a 1-0 victory against the Reds
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was the fastest nine-inning game for the Cubs since they finished a 3-0 victory over the Reds in 1 hour, 48 minutes on May 24, 2001, at Wrigley
Others: Jameson Taillon threw seven crisp innings in his second straight win, and Tyson Miller got three outs before Porter Hodge finished the four-hitter for his eighth save
